excerpt: "A growing number of companies are using chat bots and AI-led video interviews to assess job candidates before a human recruiter even meets them. Why it matters: Automated interviews vastly expand the job candidate pool and are designed to ensure consistent hiring practices by rooting out ways that bias seeps into interviews,"
